text: Arpit Narechania will join The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology (HKUST) as an Assistant Professor (tenure-track) in their Computer Science and Engineering Department, beginning January 2025. Congratulations, Arpit!
Grace Guo passed her PhD Dissertation Defense! She will be a Postdoctoral Fellow at the Visual Computing Group at Harvard starting this Fall 2024. Congratulations, Dr. Guo!
Our lab presented our latest work at ACM CHI 2024 in Honolulu, Hawai'i!
Arpit Narechania was named as one of the Graduate Teaching Fellows for 2023-24! Congratulations, Arpit!
Arpit Narechania received the national CIRTL associate and Tech to Teaching certificates by CIRTL and CTL.
Our lab presented our latest work at ACM CHI 2023 in Hamburg, Germany!
Arpit Narechania and Adam Coscia presented posters at the 2023 Georgia Tech Career, Research, and Innovation Development Conference. They won travel awards!
